servinfo.title: Engine Accessory Drive Belt Replacement (Petrol Engine Model)

servinfosub.title: Water Pump and Generator Drive Belt
servinfosub.ptxt: Replace belt referring to Water Pump and Generator Drive Belt Removal and Installation (For M16 Engine):For Petrol Engine Model or Water Pump and Generator Drive Belt Removal and Installation (For J20 Engine):For Petrol Engine Model .

servinfosub.title: Power Steering Pump and A/C Compressor (If Equipped) Drive Belt (M16 Engine)
servinfosub.ptxt: Replace belt and then adjust belt tension referring to P/S Pump and A/C Compressor (If Equipped) Drive Belt Removal and Installation (M16A Engine Model) .
